string-array.name: opciones_ayuda
string-array.item: How do I request an ad?
How do I publish an ad?
How do I edit my personal data?
How do I edit my ads?
How do I know who has requested my ads?
How do I know the status of my requests?

string-array.name: contenido_opciones_ayuda
string-array.item: Locate in the general tab, you will see two fields, one for the text contained in the ad and the other for the location of the activity, the latter is optional, fill them out and click on search, all the ads that meet the requirements will appear.
Once you have found the activity you want, click on the hands clasped button that appears below the button, this will send a request to the author of the ad as long as you have the necessary points.

In any main tab, an \'+\' icon appears in the lower right corner, press it and a new screen will open with a series of fields to fill in. Once you have finished, press the bottom button and your ad will be published and will be available to all users.

Click on the 3 points in the upper right corner, then in \'Edit my data\', a screen will open with a series of fields and with your current data, you only need to modify the one that interests you, they will only be updated the fields that have been edited.

In the profile tab your ads appear, click on the one you want to edit and a screen will open with the ad data, click again on the field you want to modify, enter the new value and click on the button.

In the profile tab you have a TRUEQES button, press it and another screen will open with two tabs, in the applicants tab the users who have requested your ads will appear along with the data of this, in addition there are two bototnes to reject or accept said requests.

In the profile tab you have a TRUEQES button, press it and another screen will open with two tabs, in the requests tab the ads you have requested to other users appear and the status they are in, if pending, rejected or accepted.
